alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:36AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Powell, Estill, northwestern Jackson and central Lee Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 235 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Locust Branch, or 8 miles southwest of Irvine, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jinks, Blanton Flats and Kings Station around 240 AM EDT. Station Camp, Witt, Wisemantown, Rice Station, Weedon and Sandhill around 245 AM EDT. Irvine, Ravenna, Wagersville, South Irvine, Alumbaugh, Drip Rock, West Irvine, North Irvine and Calloway Crossing around 250 AM EDT. Doe Creek, Cow Creek, Willow Tree, Leighton and Evelyn around 255 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
